name: One Shot At A Time
description:
Welcome to the itch.io page of my Mix & Game Jam 2020 entry : One Shot At A Time !

This game is a FPS, where two teams of two players have to kill each other... But with a twist : the game is turn-based !

I made it for the Mix & Game Jam 2020. It's more of an experience than a game to be honest, but I'm proud of the result.

There was supposed to be more maps (even with antigravity !). The mechanics have been implemented, but I didn't have the time to build the maps. But I learned a ton making those so it's all good.

The assets are from the Synty Prototype pack. I didn't have the skill and time to make 3D assets myself, so I used a pack that I really like. With the post-processing, it gives a toon/imaginary feel.

Controls :

  • Right Click : Switch Action
  • C : Switch top camera
  • P : Pause
  • Space : End Turn

The game is meant to be played in a 16/9 resolution, and in full screen.

Feel free to send me a message with your feedback !
